summary: Teenagers did not always exist. In this living collage of rare archival material, filmed portraits, and voices lifted from early 20th Century diary entries, a struggle erupts between adults and adolescents to define a new idea of youth.
cast: Jena Malone|Ben Whishaw|Julia Hummer|Jessie T. Usher|Leah Hennessey|Ivy Blackshire|Daniela Leder|Ben Rosenfield|Malik Peters|Richie Coterelle|Julia Cumming|Taylor Edward Freeman|Samuel Hecht|Casper Jorgensen|Claire Lucido|Alden Ehrenreich|Syrie Moskowitz|Alexander Sharp|Lindsey Younghans|Anne Yeomans|Henry Chesley|Perri Hofmann|Eva Jager|Rebecca Karr Kligermann|Oliver John-Rogers|Christine Romulus|Elizabeth Raiss|Rose Schlossberg|Reed Birney|Joanne Tucker|Don Anstock|Siobhan Brandman
title: Teenage
